Author: DinosaursAndStarStuf
Text: I usually do well by laying out ground rules for myself and goal-setting. If I stick to my rule of having a "normal" dinner plus one small treat after, then I get to put a big fat check mark on the calendar the next day and I get to hate myself less. I do OMAD and always give into the desire to restrict too hard when I'm sober. I guess I kinda self-medicate. But dude if I'm not careful and get too high/drunk I will eat your fuckin house. (Ps sorry for rambling, high rn lol)

Author: LowCalPal
Text: I find as long as I don't take the first bite, they go away before too long.  I drink lots of hot water until then.
